attributes.action: Allow ladies under the age of 25 to have a smear test.
attributes.additional_details: Too many girls are being missed and being caught too late with cervical cancer, due to not being eligible for a smear test before the age of 25. This needs to be stopped and girls should have the right to request one from at least the age of 18!
attributes.background: Lower the eligible age for a smear test!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325302
